article_text: Some 300 people gathered Saturday night to see the mural painted by noted Liberty City-based artist Addonis Parker unveiled along the side of the branch of the nation’s largest black-owned bank.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Addonis Parker, Teri Williams, OneUnited Bank
article_metadata.description: Some 300 people gathered Saturday night to see the mural painted by noted Liberty City-based artist Addonis Parker unveiled along the side of the branch of the nation’s largest black-owned bank.
article_metadata.title: Liberty City mural depicts racism and harsh realities of urban life | Miami Herald
